shadow.name: ENTROPY
shadow.description: The decay that occurs when creative force is released prematurely
shadow.somatic_signature: Restless agitation, inability to sit still
shadow.thought_pattern: I need to DO something. I can't just wait.

gift.name: FRESHNESS
gift.description: The capacity to bring new creative impulses into form when timing is correct
gift.behavioral_signature: Patient readiness, explosive creativity when invited
gift.thought_pattern: The timing will reveal itself. I am ready.

siddhi.name: BEAUTY
siddhi.description: When creative force aligns with divine timing, pure beauty emerges

inversion_protocols.script: You are experiencing Entropy. This is not a block; it is a battery recharge. Your creativity is a pulse, not a steady stream. The numbness you feel is the system gathering energy for the next spike. Do not push through it.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Lie down on your back. Place hands on liver (right ribcage). Feel the heaviness.

experiment.hypothesis: If I stop trying to create for 3 days, the energy will return explosively on Day 4.
experiment.action: Complete cessation of creative output. Consumption only.

success_criteria.target: Natural impulse to create without forcing

inversion_protocols.script: This is the Void. In the Individual circuitry, deep mutation requires deep darkness. You are currently in the chrysalis phase. The feeling of 'pointlessness' is chemicalâ€”it is protecting you from wasting energy while you mutate.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Turn off all lights. Sit in total darkness for 10 minutes. Merge with the blackness.

experiment.hypothesis: If I surrender to the melancholy, it will mutate into insight.
experiment.action: Do not fix the mood. Sit in it like a hot bath.

success_criteria.target: Natural emergence of clarity or creative impulse
